course.subject: ENVS
course.name: A Practicum on Marine Conservation
course.description: This one-year course engages students in practical training and enriches their knowledge and skills in relevant areas such as interpretive services under ecotourism, species identification, environmental education and nature photography in coastal habitats on Lantau. The students will also have a chance to contribute to the society through environmental education. Approval of the course coordinator is needed for students to enroll in this course. For ENVS students in their third and fourth year of study only.
